description:
Uogokoro-kun represents the city of Nagarekawa in a field day for the nation`s cute and loose characters. Nanako and Yukari are worried when Uogokoro-kun appears nervous, but the Nagarekawa girls have their own job to do: promote Nagarekawa on a national TV broadcast. Concerned a mistake might ruin the image of Nagarekawa, Nanako loses her cool.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: On a essayé de rassembler des mascottes
We Tried Gathering Cute and Loose Characters.
ゆるキャラ集めてみた.
